QuestData.Title: Finding an Old Friend
QuestData.Description: It seems Shu, the spirit of water, had a play companion when he came to the pools throughout the years. An old pandaren we know as Old Man Liang.$B$BLiang moved away from the main town and stopped practicing in the pools some time ago. I am told he lives in a small house northeast of here, up the hill.$B$BLiang may know what has driven Shu away, and where the spirit might be found.$B$BGo to Liang. Ask of Shu.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Old Man Liang at Liang's Retreat in the Singing Pools.
QuestData.RewardText: Visitors are rare up here, but you are welcome. It is nice to meet you, young $c.
